name: Right 2 Repair - Global Game Jam 2020
description:
To play download the .bin ROM and load it into your favorite Sega MegaDrive/Genesis emulator!

Right 2 Repair is a tactical 2 player player where players can fling projectiles at each other and deflect them back.

Every move must be calculated, if you commit to jumping you cannot change course, if you commit to moving forward you cannot stop or move back until completed.

First player to 10 wins!

Controls

D-Pad Left/Right: Move Left/Right

A Button: Jump

B Button: Shoot

C Button: Deflect

Tools Used

SGDK

Aseprite

Deflemask

Visual Studio Code

How to build

View the source: https://github.com/theshaneobrien/Global_Game_Jam_2020

  1. Download the latest version of SGDK
  2. Install using these instructions
  3. Clone the repo
  4. Open the folder
  5. Hit CTRL+Shift+B
  6. Find the ROM in the OUT folder
